channel.title: CVE Feed for Cockpit CMS -- Cockpit CMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cockpit CMS -- Cockpit CMS

item.title: CVE-2024-2001|2024-08-01T18:56:22.551Z -- cockpit%20cms -- cockpit%20cms
item.description: A Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in Cockpit CMS affecting version 2.7.0. This vulnerability could allow an authenticated user to upload an infected PDF file and store a malicious JavaScript payload to be executed when the file is uploaded.

item.title: CVE-2024-2001|2024-06-04T17:29:39.285Z -- cockpit%20cms -- cockpit%20cms
item.description: A Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in Cockpit CMS affecting version 2.7.0. This vulnerability could allow an authenticated user to upload an infected PDF file and store a malicious JavaScript payload to be executed when the file is uploaded.
